about_the_game:
Mining and getting Steam achievements, this is a casual idle game. Players travel to a world where mining is king. As long as you mine day and night, you can dominate the world; unlock powerful weapons and creatures, and let them join your mining army!

There are multiple kingdoms in the game, and each kingdom has a set of achievements. You can unlock the corresponding achievements by mining and digging out treasures. Every time you collect the achievements of a kingdom, you can unlock a powerful mining skill. Collect the achievements of all kingdoms and you can become the king of the world.

Mining

Dig, dig, dig. As long as you use the pickaxe well, you can be the king of the world; dig treasures from kingdoms around the world, unlock various powerful weapons and mysterious creatures; let them all come to mine for me!

Achievements

Each treasure can unlock Steam achievements. Collecting treasures from all kingdoms can unlock all Steam achievements of this game.

Place

After unlocking the first mining skill, players no longer need to mine by themselves. The creatures you summon will work for you day and night. Of course, you can continue to swing your pickaxe.

Others

  • Rankings: If you are interested in rankings, you can compete for various rankings in the game.
  • Story: OK, this game has no story, but maybe you can make one out of the treasures you dig up.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB 显存
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
